name: Stay Home (FS93)
description:
This game was made for Corona Jam, on GameJolt

The Corona Virus got all of us surprised, and now, the things that we called "Zombies" are everywhere. You control Billy, one of the survivors. The government is giving weapons and other things for our protection. Protect yourself and remember, STAY HOME...

Click here if you're interested in the game's creation! (WARNING! This video is in Portuguese)
